articles.title: Services return after Verizon outage hits Georgia - 13WMAZ.com
articles.description: A statewide outage started around 2:40 p.m. Monday. The cause is unknown at this time.
articles.content:
MACON, Ga. (UPDATE 5:15 p.m.) Some Verizon services appear to be returning as texts are starting to go through and calls can be made.
